name: Lost Boss
description:
Hey, this is a game made during the first Unofficial Defold Game Jam

The story behind the game is that we had this idea to have a game on our workplace 404-page.  And since the theme of the game jam was "Boss", we thought it would be funny to have our actual boss - Petra, be the hero of the  game and to have her look for the lost page.

Music from http://freemusicarchive.org/

Made by Calle Stenfelt, Emil Hagbo, Simon Olsson and Elias Wigert
